website_summaries.verdict: The best value cream dispenser that offers additional accessories, such as decorating nozzles and a cleaning brush.
pros: Dispenser design is comfortable to hold while dispensing cream at different angles or on different surfaces
Trigger is easy to control to get the correct pressure
cons: Included cleaning brush requires constant washing to keep the bristles clean from crusted cream

customer_reviews.title: I use it for nitro cold brew coffee!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing, but I don't use it for making whipped cream. See, I found Nitro Cold Brew at Starbucks, and I'm a thrifty girl, and can't afford the $5.40 everytime I want a grande. So I did a little research on how to DIY...and here you go! Buy or make your own cold brew, put it in this handy, dandy dispenser, and BOOM! you have fabulous Nitro Cold Brew! Winner! It arrived quickly, is sturdy, works well, and saves me money. And it's fun, to be honest. That "spshhhhh" is quite satisfying!
customer_reviews.author: Ruthie Graham

customer_reviews.title: Very hard to screw together, failed within 20 uses [UPDATED]
customer_reviews.text: This product looked very nice, but the threads to screw the cartridge in was very difficult to get together. Each time we used it, it was harder to get together and harder to get apart. Finally, it became stuck and we were unable to unscrew them. Probably should have returned it, just threw it away. UPDATE: The seller contacted me to offer a refund even through I had thrown away the item. This is incredibly good customer service. I feel as though you can confidently try buying this item as the seller will take good care of you if yours is defective like mine.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisFree

customer_reviews.title: robust and well made, the chefs loved using it.  not well documented tho
customer_reviews.text: Actually my wife ordered this but I was tasked with getting it working. Very robust & well made. Had to run to a specialty store as noone knew where to find the N2O canisters. Also taking it apart I tried to take off the cap while it was still pressurized but it was extremely difficult. I thought by removing the gas cartridge it would depressurize but such was not the case. Had I been able to remove the cap while it was still pressurized it would have been very dangerous. Fortunately I discovered it was still pressurized and then I depressurized it.
customer_reviews.author: John R. Krawczyk II

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product at a bargain.
customer_reviews.text: This is an all steel whipped cream dispenser. Others like this go for more than twice the price. Makes sodas with CO2 and whips anything with NO2. All seals have stayed solid so far. I’ve charged it with two canisters which puts considerable pressure inside the main canister. It’s a quality product sold by a quality seller who takes the time to make sure you are a satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality/price
customer_reviews.text: Nice whipped cream dispenser! As long as you have good cartridges, and assemble it properly, it makes great whipped cream!! It was built much nicer, and of higher quality that I would expect for the price.
customer_reviews.author: AMAZEmole

customer_reviews.title: I picked the best one out of sea of choices
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after reading reviews on multiple competitors, and being confused about quality comparison. What made me choose this offering was the great reviews on service. Wow, were they right!. I love the product, my grandkids are full of glee when we use it, it's beautiful, substantial, instructions are exacting. I had a quick question about care, sent an email at 6 pm and got an answer at 10 pm that same night. Dazzled by the product and the service. Buy it! They deserve your business and you deserve their product. Have fun!
customer_reviews.author: andropogon

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the quality and build
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the best quality whipped cream dispenser you can find on the market, at least it was for me. Most other ones that's of the same price or even higher have plastic parts. This one is all metal. You also get extra nozzles and a cleaning brush, so that's even better. The threaded part that the charger goes on can come loose with frequent use, but you can tighten it again with a wrench, so it's not a problem. The dispenser uses a large lever for better control compared to other ones that only uses a button. Parts can be easily disassembled for cleaning and repair.
customer_reviews.author: pfr

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Great product, i'm a professional sous chef, bought this and the whole kitchen loves it, when i can handle sharing it, it is also well built, it dropped from the top shelf of the reach-in and only bent one tooth on the stainless steel dispense tip, easily fixed with a spoon, would buy again, but i doubt i'll have the need. Je l'adore!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: PLASTIC n2o holder
customer_reviews.text: The whole thing is metal except the thing that holds the nitrous cartridge. Therefore, you have plastic threading onto metal. Really stupid. The first time I used it a bit of plastic sheered off... and the next couple of times as well. This isn't going to last at all.
customer_reviews.author: Meaghan

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product with no downsides to be seen yet.
customer_reviews.text: Our bar uses these (2) for making specialty whipped creams. We really enjoy the products on all of its metrics and will buy more of these if and when we need more, but that won't be for a while being that they are of a superior quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Did not work....  I finagled, but no luck... not a good buy
customer_reviews.text: If you buy this, be sure to check the tips.... Mine had been previously returned, most likely defective, and I didn't notice it until I went to try a different tip. The cartridge (not included) is distributed, but the cream does not whip, it just comes out like a fountain. I don't know if any of them work. Unfortunately, I gave these as gifts.... I will have to get them back if my siblings and mom had no luck. How embarrassing! I'll have to get with my relatives... I may have to send them all back. What a nightmare! This was NOT a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: S. Cowan

customer_reviews.title: and most of the parts were stainless steel (vs plastic) - I'm happy with my choice
customer_reviews.text: I had been wanting to try one of these for ages, and decided on this one as the reviews were solid, and most of the parts were stainless steel (vs plastic) - I'm happy with my choice. It makes fantastic whipped cream (as it should) and I plan to try carbonated fruit and drinks (already have the CO2 cartridges at the ready) soon. I use 1/3 less sugar, and double strength vanilla than they suggest and it's perfect (my dog totally approves as well).
customer_reviews.author: LTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This cream whipper worked perfectly. I have made homemade whip cream in the past but this device made it so much easier. I just put the ingredients in and put it in the fridge while finishing my cheesecake.
customer_reviews.author: mddoty

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product as well as the customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the coffee bar I just opened. I was having issues with it and they immediately sent a replacement. When I still had problems they were immediately on it to help me figure out what I was doing wrong. This is a great product and I could not have been more impressed with the customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Beans LLC

customer_reviews.title: High Quality at best price.
customer_reviews.text: Product shipping time was lightning fast & the product packaging was excellent. The dispenser seems to be made of high-quality materials and comes with a variety of accessories for not only dispensing the whipped cream but also cleaning the dispenser and the smaller parts. I have used the dispenser to make whipped cream but have also made 'nitro brew cold coffee' with this dispenser. Love it so far! Would definitely buy again from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this dispenser!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for 6-8 months now and I LOVE it!! I make homemade Frappuccinos at home and also love to add it to my hot coffee in the morning. Tastes just like Starbucks whipped cream only way better because I made it ;) Great communication from the seller and the product is nice and sturdy. Easy to clean, love the extra nozzle attachments... all around highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Christine  McCann

customer_reviews.title: I have 2 Isi canisters and this one is better constructed.
customer_reviews.text: Well made. All stainless including the 3 tips. Came with 2 brushes. I have 2 Isi canisters and this one is better constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Fredric Belfus

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: We love it! Very well made and easy to use. We used alot of canned whip cream and by making our own should save $. Talked to a barista from Starbucks and put vanilla and a little sugar and tastes awesome.
customer_reviews.author: P. Kraus

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Got my Whipped Cream Dispenser a Few weeks ago. Very pleased with it. Easy to use. Takes a couple of minutes to make fresh whipped cream without all the additives that come in store brought whipped cream. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Total piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: Thought this unit was all stainless...it's not. Lots of plastic that looks stainless. Its already failing about 1/2 the time I put a charger in. Total junk.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: This thing is well built and works great
customer_reviews.text: We have run a few hundred chargers though it, it still works consistently. I wish it had a plain plastic nozzle, but it doesn't waste chargers, and the action on the lever is just right, not to sensitive, and not too dull.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Rutan

customer_reviews.title: Nothing like having fresh whipped cream at your disposal!
customer_reviews.text: Great little gadget, works great so far. No leaks, etc. Like that the tips are stainless vs the plastic ones I've seen. Only complaint is about my waistline!
customer_reviews.author: Grid

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: So convenient. Whipped cream comes out fluffy and I like the different tips. Wasted one charger when I didn’t close the canister tight enough so be mindful. I use with confectioners erythritol or monk fruit and some vanilla extract. I’m a kitchen gadget lover so it’s a win! Strawberries, cheesecake, hot chocolate here we come!
customer_reviews.author: Emarie720

customer_reviews.title: Cartridge piercer is damaged
customer_reviews.text: This top for the unit has a bad cartridge piercer which causes the gas to leak and the cartridge to get stuck when attempting to remove the cartridge. It becomes pretty wasteful. If I got a defect then maybe an exchange would be nice. But if they are designed like this. This is totally not worth it
customer_reviews.author: Tin K Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Cheap junk that will fail in a month.
customer_reviews.text: Lowest possible quality for a whipped cream dispenser. There is zero stainless steel in this product - only metal painted aluminum and plastic. The cartridge mount is a low end plastic or resin; it has already stripped, it is so hard to unscrew that we are developing callouses, and it feels cheap. Replacing this with anything else, immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Vic in San Francisco

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It is so easy to use, once you read the instructions. I have never used a Whipped Cream Dispenser before. I just always bought the stuff in the cans at the grocery store. I use it several times a week. I'm very happy with this purchase and would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Christa K

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This is nice and sturdy! I purchased An all metal one because the plastic heads kept cracking on another brand. I will certainly Buy a couple more. It works great!
customer_reviews.author: Bill M

customer_reviews.title: This is a fantastic addition to my kitchen tools
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic addition to my kitchen tools. It works perfectly and adds that special finishing touch to so many deserts. Friends are amazed and I wouldn’t be surprised if several of them purchase one 😀. Strawberries are in!!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia B.

customer_reviews.title: Aluminum threads did not hold up.
customer_reviews.text: Only lasted about 20 charges before the aluminum threading gave out. It also produced a lot of aluminum shavings which obviously I don't want in my food. I'll be looking for a steel replacement. EDIT: Bumped to 3 stars. Seller reached out to me and has issued a refund.
customer_reviews.author: B Rush

customer_reviews.title: The Best There Is!
customer_reviews.text: An absolutely amazing product at an unbeatable price, My wife and I love this dispenser it's very well made and works perfectly. I will continue to buy from AmazeChef and recommend them to anyone and everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Chris W

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and fun
customer_reviews.text: Love my whipped cream dispenser, it’s is so fun to make our own flavors and know how fresh the product is when using. We go through a lot of nitro cartridges...
customer_reviews.author: Gina D

customer_reviews.title: NEED TO RETURN...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 cream whippers...One for me and one as a wedding gift. I could not make mine work. I was successful in returning it. The Bride and Groom in Ohio received the 2 part order of the cream whipper and chargers. They are fearful of trying it since mine did not work. It is past the normal 1 month to return. COULD YOU PLEASE MAKE AN EXCEPTION TO RETURN THE ITEMS - PERHAPS FOR CREDIT FOR FURTHER SHOPPING WITH YOU GOING TO THE BRIDE AND GROOM ? I have more time on my hands. The Bride and Groom have had wedding, moving and jobs to take care of 5 days a week....HELP PLEASE.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great
customer_reviews.text: We loved this whip cream dispenser. We used it to make a chocolate mousse and it worked great. Clean up seem easy enough.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Great Dispenser for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Very well made whipped cream dispenser. The cartridge holder is made of plastic but I have had no issues. I have had dispensers in the past where the plastic cartridge holder broke after a few uses, but I have had no issues with this model. The wire bush is also well made and a great help when cleaning. Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Drain

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST!!!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly this is probably my favorite Amazon purchase ever! I’ve been using DAILY for almost one year and STILL highly recommend. Tips: don’t forget to by co2 chargers and be sure to watch a YouTube video Or read instructions before You use so you know how to use. I put mine in the freezer for 2-5 minutes before I pour in the heavy cream and it comes out amazing every time!
customer_reviews.author: Raquel Harrigan

customer_reviews.title: Fun Kitchen Gadget
customer_reviews.text: This cream whipper is awesome! We have used to to create whipped cream so far and it worked great! I am excited to make flavored whipped cream for the holidays. It is a healthier, tastier, and more fun way to make whipped cream for desserts. It can also be used to make whipped coffee, and since we love Nitro Brew coffees, I am looking forward to trying that out. Overall, it is build very well, straight forward to use, and comes with cleaning brushes. It is a great value and a great product, I plan on buying more as Christmas gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Dionna Neally

customer_reviews.title: Light and fluffy whipped cream
customer_reviews.text: The AmazeChef is so easy to use, but best of all is the light, fluffy whipped cream that it consistently makes. It's a great product and fun to use. So much easier than getting out the mixer and trying to get the consistency of the whipped cream right. I love being able to have fresh whipped cream on hand -- with no added sugar or additives -- to put on top of summer's fresh fruit -- especially strawberries and peaches. Yum!
customer_reviews.author: mccark

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully machined.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know what to expect when I ordered this, but it is extremely well made, with beautifully machined aluminum, there different tips, a good silicon gaskets. Elegant, sturdy, and perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Mathiasen

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy !!
customer_reviews.text: I am so frustrated with this Dispenser. I have used it twice and now the lid won’t seal and it leaks preventing pressure build up. I just went thru three cartridges and can not get it to build pressure. My husband tightened the lid for me .. still leaks. Dessert ruined. Do not buy this !!! Update. Even tho the product failed me, the customer service has been excellent with very quick responses. They are sending me a new one. Maybe I just got the one that had a glitch from the factory 🤷🏼‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Wayne H. John

customer_reviews.title: Great dispenser
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first one 2 years ago. We use so much that decided to get a second one for chocolate mousse and other creams. Wonderful dispenser. Fast shipping
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: The AmazeChef Cream Whipper will AMAZE you!
customer_reviews.text: Love my AmazeChef Cream Whipper! The design is great and very easy to use. The quality of the whipper is excellent! I love that it has stainless steel tips. Many of the other brands have plastic tips. This one also comes with a handy cleaning tool to keep the whipper in perfect condition. The whipper makes my desserts and coffee drinks look professional. It also saves you $ and is much healthier than store-bought canister whipped cream. A must-have item for all at-home chefs that want to add that professional touch to their creations!
customer_reviews.author: RWM

customer_reviews.title: No fluffy whipped cream from this unit.
customer_reviews.text: This does not make whipped cream. It’s “okay” for making nitro coffee but the cream never whips up properly. Ended up buying a different model from a restaurant store locally that worked much better.
customer_reviews.author: Catt W

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I love this dispenser! I used a similar one when I worked at Starbucks years ago. It makes whipping cream so easy. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Delaney Polidori

customer_reviews.title: Horrible experience
customer_reviews.text: The dispenser must leak. It never maintained pressure long enough to dispense all the whipped cream. Of course, we missed the Amazon window to send back.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t seal properly
customer_reviews.text: Threads hard to line up over time they will strip. Rubber seal doesn’t seal. Sent it back, this is aluminum and is cheap invest another $20. And get stainless steel
customer_reviews.author: captain ron

customer_reviews.title: Quality product with great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for a year now and it's held up great. It's heavy and I don't worry about my safety when using it because it feels so well-made. My pin became dull after daily use and I contacted customer service to find out how to buy a replacement. They were prompt in their response and have been great about checking in with me to see if my issue is resolved. I would highly recommend the AmazeChef brand of cream whipper.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Lukes

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT dispenser and EXCELLENT customer service
customer_reviews.text: Solid SS dispenser , easy to assemble and clean . works perfect every time , OUTSTANDING customer service , responds within minutes . will most definitely purchase from this seller again . Excellent experience
customer_reviews.author: Amaryllissmile

customer_reviews.title: Fun kitchen tool
customer_reviews.text: Makes wonderful thick stable whipped cream. Decorative tips worked well. Kids loved it. Much better than commercial whipped cream in cans & easier than making with the mixer.
customer_reviews.author: Mary D. Barakzai

customer_reviews.title: The easiest way to make whipped cream.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Ordered one for each of my kids and they loved theirs as well. Just add a liquid diet sweetener and a little vanilla to real heavy whipping cream and Shazam! Stores well in refrigerator. ❤️❤️❤️
customer_reviews.author: Susan L. Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Threading on cap jammed within 2days. Do not buy if you want it to last more than a week.
customer_reviews.author: guy

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This item is very easy to use. The directions are simple to understand. I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: helen

customer_reviews.title: the plastic cap is bad.  painted metalggr color too.. lame!
customer_reviews.text: Great for lots of tasty home whipped topping creations. Only issue is the cartridge cap is plastic!! Becareful not to crossthread it or whatever because then it wont work. Make it metal like the rest of the product? Otherwise a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: Omg the best don’t feel cheap
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use comes out beautifully n taste like old school wipp I’m in love the only problem I have is where changer goes it feels super cheap but that doesn’t change the way I feel about it
customer_reviews.author: Jocelynmercado

customer_reviews.title: Awesome whipped cream dispenser
customer_reviews.text: I have had the dispenser now for a few months and it is truly awesome! It is easy to clean, easy to use, and the whipped cream it churns out is out of this world. Worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.author: First-time mom

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect! Has been working well... not sure how other people could damage this but it’s been good
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Wawawawa...wow!
customer_reviews.text: Exceptional. Stop freezing your fingers with crackers! I went through 100 cartridges in 3 days. I don’t know if it’s the quarantine but I am able to whip a ton more cream more efficiently in 1/10 of the usual time!
customer_reviews.author: Chris G.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellently made product that performs exactly like it should. I am very pleased with the quality of materials used and the simple, but effective design. It makes delicious whipped cream that you can have at the ready whenever your awesome wife makes pudding or cocoa or cake or sundaes. Or maybe that's just my wife. 5 stars for the whipped cream maker. 10 stars for my wife. :)
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Ruege

customer_reviews.title: works great, could be used in a commercial kitchen it ...
customer_reviews.text: Very well built, works great, could be used in a commercial kitchen it is so rugged. Tips are also stainless steel, no cheap plastic parts like others are made. Great price point. Uses standard NO2 cartridges.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: did not work
customer_reviews.text: From the moment we took it out fo the box we were not able to get this to function properly. I purchased various brands of gas canisters and followed all the directions and was not able to get it to function. I went through over a dozen gas canisters and three different brands of heavy whipping cream. I could not get it to function correctly
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey W. Espeseth

customer_reviews.title: Not a heavy metal container
customer_reviews.text: I love that this is a mom owned business from the US! They even sent me a personalized thank you note. We’re keto and having easy ready to use whip cream that is in a stainless steel container with organic heavy whipping cream rocks! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Blake and Kassie Gregory

customer_reviews.title: I scream, you scream, we all scream for whipped cream!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this whipped cream dispenser at the recommendation of my friend. It arrived very quickly and has such cute packaging. It even comes with the recipe for some delicious whipped cream. It is very easy to use and easy to clean. After reading other reviews, I’m excited to try and make nitro cold brew! This is the kitchen gadget you never knew you needed, but can’t live without.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Rimpo

customer_reviews.title: Easy as pie!
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be a great way to add homemade whipped cream to special desserts but I was a little intimidated about how to put it together! Turns out, it was very simple, easy to use and worked great! It looks exactly like the ones they use at Starbucks -and the whipped cream was a big hit! Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Good not great
customer_reviews.text: Great price and worked, but the plastic tip is very fragile and became loose where it connects to the aluminum. It threads on but the threads aren’t well designed and the tip falls off. The rest of the unit seems to be in great quality.
customer_reviews.author: stephen

customer_reviews.title: EASY TO USE AND CLEAN!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this product once, however, it made the best whipped cream I have ever had. I will never go back to store bought after using this product. The whipped cream is light and doesn’t leave that chemically residue in your mouth. It also come with a how to on making whipped cream!! And the cleaning utensils needed clean it properly!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Hard to pinpoint one good thing it is so usefull
customer_reviews.author: Passion Star

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used it a few times since we got it to make regular and chocolate whipping cream. So far it’s worked perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Sandrin

customer_reviews.title: Makes great whipped cream!
customer_reviews.text: This device is great! Instructions were clear, and easy to follow. The whipped cream or made was perfect. I made the base recipe included and it was perfect topping for some pound cake and strawberries. I want to try making it with coconut milk too
customer_reviews.author: Eric B

customer_reviews.title: Professional Grade whipper
customer_reviews.text: Rigt out of hw box this cream whipper looks like it can right off the shelf at Starbucks. It has a solid feel to it. The tips are easy to exchange and the product is over all very easy to use. It does it all itself, all you have to do is press down the lever. I would highly suggest this to anyone who is a whipped cream fan, it makes quick, easy, and delicious whipped cream almost instantly.
customer_reviews.author: Ella Philips

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk! They DONT WORK!
customer_reviews.text: Worst machine ever! Don’t waste your money. Never even worked right out of the box!
customer_reviews.author: Garren

customer_reviews.title: Help! Quality usually not an issue... UNTIL NOW
customer_reviews.text: Product broke and fell apart within weeks of use. This particular model is cheaply made. Please at least replace cost or credit towards another. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: CPB

customer_reviews.title: MMMMMMM GOOD!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Just shake a little more if not firm enough.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy P

customer_reviews.title: ) Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This whipped cream dispenser is definitely a winner -- we have already used it twice (once for a Chambord whipped cream, and once for cantaloupe espuma to go with a fancy prosciutto dish.) Easy to use, easy to clean (not to be overlooked -- the cleaning utensils that come with it are very helpful) and it looks good. I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica P.

customer_reviews.title: Get something made of stainless
customer_reviews.text: The butter soft aluminum threads on this failed after one use. The unit is cross threaded and cannot be unscrewed anymore. Save your money and buy something entirely made of stainless so it doesn't break after a single canister. Update: Seller contacted me promptly and offered a full refund or replacement of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Not worth time to try n buy this
customer_reviews.text: Absolute garbage first canister put in held htill it all got in then jus leaked straight from the gasket on the top no matter how hard I tighten the top it won't hold an the canisters aren't cheap
customer_reviews.author: Bagoftrixxx

customer_reviews.title: Amazing whip cream!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this thing!! Even my mom is using it all of the time since she loves whip cream. She’s diabetic and can’t have your typical whip cream so she’s using it on her pies, ice cream, coffee, EVERYTHING. It’s super easy to use and it comes out perfect! I’m totally recommending it to all of my friends and family. Definitely a must buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Starbucks Style Whip!
customer_reviews.text: Very well built. All metal except the CO2 Cap, but that's okay. It's just a cap and is durable. The rest if it is thick and heavy. Works perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Unearthlydust

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction and great extras
customer_reviews.text: Product construction is solid and the package included many great extras, particularly the cleaning brushes.
customer_reviews.author: David D

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product. Is like the professional type
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. Is like the professional type. Just make sure when use the first time screw the gas canister on tight, like it says, till a little hiss is escaping. Excellent Customer Service answering questions within minutes. I had a problem since I had never used a similar product. Marianne
customer_reviews.author: marianne piotrowski

customer_reviews.title: No regrets👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: It’s just what I needed and the cleaning sponge comes in handy too.
customer_reviews.author: Lance

customer_reviews.title: Loose seal.. tighten it for your life
customer_reviews.text: Wasted 3 or 4 co2 canisters on it before I realized it just won't seal properly. Even had my boyfriend tighten it as far as he could and the gas would escape from under the lid. The second one works fine as long as you tighten it with all your might. Definitely would like to replace the broken one or get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Malori

customer_reviews.title: Love this heavy duty dispenser
customer_reviews.text: Love this heavy duty dispenser. Easy to put together and use. Comes with three different nozzles for decorating. Easy to clean with the brushes that comes along with the dispenser. Makes tasty whipped cream. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sami F.

customer_reviews.title: Love me some whip cream
customer_reviews.text: It does as I expected. I always keep in fridge or freezer before I use so its nice and cold.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, it is so easy to use and a great item to bring to parties and get together because it’s easily reusable. The sleek box design and stainless steal tip are great. I will definitely be using this thing very often because I seems that it’ll last a long time. It dispenses whipped cream like a great dream. Definitely worth the investment
customer_reviews.author: Shane Rockenbach

customer_reviews.title: Loved this product
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product. It was exactly as described in the listing. All the additional included pieces made this a really great buy. Would recommend to anyone looking for a whipper kit.

customer_reviews.title: My Niece loves this!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Amazechef Whipped Cream Dispenser as a gift for my niece. She absolutely loves it. She uses it to make yummy desserts for her kids and specialty drinks for herself "just like Starbucks". The cleaning tool was just a bonus that makes it easy to clean. I'm so glad I found this on Amazon.

customer_reviews.title: Not durable.
customer_reviews.text: The threads on the cartridge cracker are soft and the threads have flattened. No longer able to dispense cartridges. Only had it a few months.

customer_reviews.title: AmazeChef gives amazing service
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy nitro coffee and use the whip cream maker to turn cold brew coffee into nitro coffee. A gasket was missing when I received the product. I contacted the company and received an immediate reply along with the gasket needed! I would order from AmazeChef again.

customer_reviews.text: I ordered this dispenser months ago, but finally used it over 4th of July weekend. Everyone loved having real whipped cream (no sugar added) at the press of the pump. Would highly recommend this product. It worked as promised.

customer_reviews.text: My wife and kids loved this whipped cream dispenser. They found it easy to use and clean. With just a few ingredients, we had delicious whipped cream to top our desserts. The end product was sweet and creamy. I would highly recommend this product!

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Use this all the time! Works well and easy to use.

If you're looking for a fresh whipped cream dispenser, you can stop making your life more difficult than necessary by trying to look at all the many options; this one works great

customer_reviews.text: I had amazing whipped cream for my strawberry shortcakes. I noticed when I had to refill it, some cream was left and I had to rinse it before the second use. So some people must not have tipped it all the way over. User error not the dispenser. Hit of the party.

product_meta.title: AmazeChef Whipped Cream Dispenser with 3 Stainless Steel Tips and Bonus Full Size Cleaning Brush-1 Pint Cream Whipper-Whip Cream Maker-Use with N2O cream chargers (not included)
feature_bullets: 3 STAINLESS STEEL DECORATIVE TIPS, which prevents wear and tear. This is much sturdier than plastic tips and no cross threading. The dispenser and head is made with sturdy ALUMINUM steel. With AmazeChef, you will only need to purchase a whipping cream dispenser once.
BONUS ITEM INCLUDES TWO CLEANING BRUSHES for the whip cream dispenser and for the decorative tips. AmazeChef makes your home cooking AND clean up easy!

SAVE TIME & MAKE NO MESS: Make fresh homemade whipped cream with this gourmet whipper and whip cream maker; No more messy bowls and mixers needed! Just pour a few ingredients in the aluminum steel cannister, charge with a 8g (N2O) charger (not included), & shake a few times

IMAGINE THE POSSIBILITIES: Great birthday gift for the home chef, top your coffee/hot chocolate or impress your friends & family with fresh whipped cream on your desserts. Surprise your kids with fun toppings on their pancakes and waffles.

RISK FREE PURCHASE: AmazeChef aims for 100% customer satisfaction. If you are not happy with our cream whipper, just contact us and we will make it right! Just read our reviews and you'll see that we take care of all our customers
